name: go
description: A collection of Go-focused prompts for Cursor
author: jeremytoce

prompts.name: interfaces
prompts.description: Helps design and implement Go interfaces effectively, including composition and type assertions

prompts.name: goroutines
prompts.description: Guides through concurrent programming with goroutines, including lifecycle management and synchronization

prompts.name: error-handling
prompts.description: Assists with implementing idiomatic Go error handling, custom error types, and error wrapping

prompts.name: struct-methods
prompts.description: Helps implement methods for structs, choosing receivers, and handling embedding patterns

prompts.name: concurrency-patterns
prompts.description: Guides through implementing common Go concurrency patterns like worker pools and pipeline processing

prompts.name: testing
prompts.description: Assists with writing effective Go tests, including table-driven tests and benchmarks

prompts.name: generics
prompts.description: Helps implement generic types and functions using Go's type parameter system

prompts.name: dependency-injection
prompts.description: Guides through structuring applications with clean dependency injection patterns

prompts.name: middleware
prompts.description: Assists with creating and chaining HTTP middleware in Go web applications

prompts.name: reflection
prompts.description: Helps use the reflect package effectively for runtime type inspection and manipulation
